IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: BY CREATING HOMES, PROVIDING EDUCATIONAL OPPORTUNITIES, AND FOSTERING HEALTHY FAMILIES, WE PROVIDE DISADVANTAGED WOMEN WITH THE OPPORTUNITY TO TRANSFORM THEIR LIVES.
IRS990.MissionDescription: BEATITUDE HOUSE, SPONSORED BY THE URSULINE SISTERS, IS COMMITTED TO DISADVANTAGED WOMEN AND CHILDREN IN THE MAHONING VALLEY. IN AN ATMOSPHERE OF CARE AND COMPASSION, THE PROGRAMS FOCUS ON COUNSELING TO PROMOTE SELF-DEVELOPMENT AND EDUCATION TO OBTAIN NEEDED SKILLS. THROUGH THIS HOLISTIC APPROACH, BOTH WOMEN AND CHILDREN ARE EMPOWERED WITH THE TRAINING, KNOWLEDGE, WORK HABITS AND MOTIVATION TO REALIZE THEIR FULL POTENTIAL.
IRS990.Description: TRANSITIONAL HOUSING FOR HOMELESS WOMEN WITH CHILDREN. OVER 80% OF THE FAMILIES COMPLETING THE PROGRAM WERE ABLE TO MOVE TO PERMANENT HOUSING.

Activity2.Description: OUR EDUCATION & JOB TRAINING PROGRAM PROVIDED SERVICES TO 90 WOMEN INCLUDING SPECIAL TRAINING FOR A WORKER-OWNED CLEANING SERVICE.

Activity3.Description: OUR PERMANENT SUPPORTIVE HOUSING PROGRAM SERVED 16 FAMILIES ENABLING THESE DISABLED WOMEN TO MAINTAIN PERMANENT STABLE HOUSING FOR THEMSELVES AND THEIR CHILDREN.

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: THE ORGANIZATION USES ITS ENDOWMENT FUNDS TO SUPPORT GENERAL OPERATIONS OR EDUCATIONAL PROGRAMS. ENDOWMENT FUNDS ARE APPROPRIATED BASED ON THE ENDOWMENT POLICY APPROVED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

BEATITUDE HOUSE IS A NONPROFIT ORGANIZATION THAT IS TAX EXEMPT UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE. THE ORGANIZATION BELIEVES THAT IT HAS APPROPRIATE SUPPORT FOR ANY TAX POSITIONS TAKEN, AND AS SUCH, DOES NOT HAVE ANY UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT ARE MATERIAL TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE ORGANIZATION'S FEDERAL EXEMPT ORGANIZATION BUSINESS RETURNS ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY THE IRS, GENERALLY FOR THREE YEARS AFTER THEY WERE FILED.

Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Identifier: MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS,
Form990ScheduleIPartIV.Explanation: THE AGENCY ESTABLISHED A COMMITTEE MADE UP OF BOARD MEMBERS AND STAFF TO DEVELOP A PROCEDURE FOR PROVIDING GRANTS FOR EDUCATION. ALL FUNDS ARE CONTRIBUTED DIRECTLY TO THE EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTION OR TO THE PROVIDER; E.G., A BOOK STORE. GRANTS ARE PROVIDED AS FUNDING THAT IS AVAILABLE FOR STUDENTS TO ATTEND EDUCATIONAL INSTITUTIONS AT ALL LEVELS.

GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE URSULINE SISTERS OF YOUNGSTOWN IS THE SOLE CORPORATE MEMBER OF BEATITUDE HOUSE.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: ELECTION OF MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY,
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: THE SELECTION, APPOINTMENT, AND REMOVAL OF A MEMBER OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS ARE PREROGATIVES RESERVED FOR THE MEMBER OF THE CORPORATION.
THE MEMBER HAS THE RIGHT TO APPROVE ANY CHANGE IN THE NATURE OR PURPOSE OF THE ORGANIZATION AND CHANGE IN THE CORPORATE STRUCTURE OR BYLAWS AND HAS THE RIGHT TO SELECT OR REMOVE BOARD MEMBERS.
THE AUDIT COMMITTEE AND THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE BOTH REVIEW FORM 990. IT IS THEN PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: REVIEW OF THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY,
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: BOARD MEMBERS ARE REQUIRED TO REVIEW AND SIGN THE CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY STATEMENT ANNUALLY.
BEATITUDE HOUSE'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE ALL AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
